Genre: Drama, Biography, History

Directed by Andrei Tarkovsky

Cast: Margaret Terekhov, Anatoly Solonitsyn, Nicholas Grin'ko, Ignat Daniltsev, Philip Jankowski, Alla Demidova, Larissa Tarkovskaya, Yuri Nazarov, Oleg Jankowski, Jura Sventikov, E. Del, Innocent Smoktunovskij

Description: A reflection film - one of the best films of Russian director Andrei Tarkovsky. Its working title was "White, White Day." In a remarkable picture of some of the verses of the poet Arseny Tarkovsky, the director's father. The film's protagonist recalls his childhood, his mother, the people who helped his family in the difficult post-war period. "In the" Mirror "I would not tell about themselves and about their feelings associated with family and friends about my relationship with them, the eternal pity for them and irreplaceable sense of duty" - said Andrei Tarkovsky.
